news.title: Seeking volunteers for a UK Meeting Organizing Committee

body.p: Gentoo is seeking volunteers who would be willing to organize a meeting for UK-based Gentoo developers and users for September or early October. The initial venue will be Manchester.
Specifically, we need people who can:

ul.li: organize a venue and internet access
organize accomodation for those travelling from afar
anything else that you can think of

body.p: Users interested in participating should post their availability and interest to this thread on the Forums.
